Name: Greco-Persian Wars
Significance: Preserved independence of Greek states; shaped Western history

Name: Norman Conquest of England
Belligerents: Duchy of Normandy vs. Anglo-Saxon England
Significance: Transformation of English language, law, and aristocracy

Name: Hundred Years' War
Belligerents: Kingdom of England vs. Kingdom of France
Leaders: Edward III, Henry V, Joan of Arc, Charles V
Significance: Rise of national identities; decline of feudalism
